meanings.definition: A Polish coin worth one-hundredth of a zloty.
meanings.sent1: I found a grosze on the street.
meanings.sent3: The grosze rolled under the couch and played hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: His savings were as scarce as a single grosze.
meanings.sent5: The shiny grosze sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: They paid with grosze at the market.
meanings.sent2: The jar was full of colorful grosze.
meanings.sent3: The grosze danced in the coin jar, jingling happily.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were scattered like loose grosze.
meanings.sent5: The sound of grosze clinking together was music to his ears.
